text: Du’ti dalera paraspara sam'mukhina ha'oyara madhye tomadera jan'ya abasya'i nidarsana rayeche. Ekadala yud'dha karachila allah‌ra pathe, an'ya dala chila kaphera; tara taderake cokhera dekhaya dekhachila tadera dbiguna. Allah‌ yake iccha apana sahayya dbara saktisali karena [1]. Niscaya'i ete antardrsti sampanna lokadera jan'ya siksa rayeche
